alert.note: Alert for Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:12PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oakland County through 645 PM EDT... At 612 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Birmingham, or near Southfield, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Birmingham around 625 PM EDT. Royal Oak and Detroit Zoo around 635 PM EDT. Warren, Troy and Sterling Heights around 645 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Franklin, Madison Heights, Clawson, Berkley, Oak Park, Hazel Park, Lathrup Village, Bingham Farms, Bloomfield Hills and Beverly Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
